plurals.name: alert_dialog_exit_ecm
plurals.item: Device will be in Emergency callback mode for %s minutes. Applications using data connection cannot be used while in this mode. Exit now?
Unable to use data connection for applications. Device will be in Emergency callback mode for %s minutes while in this mode. Exit now?

plurals.name: alert_dialog_not_avaialble_in_ecm
plurals.item: Selected action not available in Emergency callback mode. Device will be in this mode for %s minutes. Exit now?
